about_the_game:
In this game, you play as the Queen of the Insectoid race, instead of being a righteous messenger. Your objective is to create intricate mazes underground in the city to resist the human soldiers who come to vanquish you! From thugs to mechanical warriors, they possess a wide range of classes, but fear not, for the Queen is undaunted! You will cultivate a mighty army of insects to withstand the invaders.

Build Your Own Maze

Freely excavate mazes to confuse the human soldiers in their pursuit of you, and have them fall prey to your monsters.

Ecosystem

Your minions are true insectoid creatures. They not only kill enemies but also prey on their own kind, nurturing your ecosystem and allowing it to thrive sustainably.

Monster Evolution

Choose to enhance your favorite monsters, making them more powerful, and cultivate armies with characteristics that align with your preferences.

Diverse Array of Enemies

At first, your enemies may be thugs, but soon you will face soldiers, bounty hunters, and even mechanical warriors...

name: Queen,Don't be afraid

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 or greater
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon R9 280X

short_description: In this game, you play as the Queen of the Insectoid race, instead of being a righteous messenger. Your objective is to create intricate mazes underground in the city to resist the human soldiers who come to vanquish you!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Hungarian, Czech, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Korean
